I am HelpBot, created by Ayana Hussain in December 2022. I use a machine learning model to provide the most probable response to a given input. There are still many ways I could be improved. I hope this helps.

patterns: what can I do when im sad
what should I do when im sad
responses: I know life can be painful sometimes, and although your wounds may hurt a lot, it is this pain that will help us grow and become the best version of ourselves. This pain will teach us the greatest lessons, and lead us to possibilies we hadn't known existed. We may not realize it until later but sometimes this pain is the push one needs to achieve success. So keep working hard, you can do it!
